ThingDef.Name: Kurin_MeleeWeapon_Ceremonial_Sword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin ceremonial sword
ThingDef.description: A ceremonial sword of kurins. It's not a combat designed sword, but it's good enough to cut enemies in a half.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_MeleeWeapon_Katana_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin longsword
ThingDef.description:
Replica of legendary blade of kurins. In kurins' medieval ages they had a kind of warriors that used to have this kind of blade, and one of them passed a long way to save his master, so his name was inscribed into history of kurins.

Name of the blade? "Kusabimaru".

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Gun_Hunting_Shotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin hunting shotgun
ThingDef.description: It is forbidden to hunt foxes at kurins' homeplanet, but there are kurin hunters that like to hunt for biological descendants of roe deer, rabbits and bears with these hunting shotguns.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Special_Rocket_Launcher_Typhoon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin Typhoon
ThingDef.description:
[FXRLT] "Typhoon" is an ultra-modern single use shoulder-fired anti-mechanoid missile launcher of kurins which fires with a massive explosive projectile.

Its missile is very effective against mechanoids.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Special_Rocket_Launcher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin rocket launcher
ThingDef.description: [FXRL] "Damnation" is a modern single use shoulder-fired missile launcher of kurins which fires with a standart explosive projectile.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Gun_Sniper_Charge_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin sniper charge weapon

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Gun_Sniper_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: [FXSR] "Winger" is a modern sniper rifle of kurins.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Gun_Stun_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin stun pistol
ThingDef.description:
[FXSP] "Pranker" is a modern bolt-action silenced stun gun of kurins with a tranquilising effect that temporarily incapacitates a target if the target is not too large (not bigger than x2 human body size (including)).

Suitable for quelling protests, suppressing prison riots, and just for calming raving kurins.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Gun_Surigum_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin surigum
ThingDef.description: A dagger-shaped kurin shuriken. Limited ranged attacks are also possible.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Kurin_Gun_Unmaker_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kurin Unmaker
ThingDef.description:
[FXBEG] "Unmaker" is an ultra-secret Kurin Big Energy Gun.

Only few kurins that were contributed to creation of this monster saw it, and ever less could try it at Secret Polygons test site.

Unmakes a target.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
